data.message:
value

        Value is something we find 
        Sometimes toward forward 
            Otherwise it's behind 
If you look hard enough to find signs 
   In time, all things wise rhyme fine 
     But time it takes to rhyme divine 
     As red stains of wine stain mind 
 Gains of time find wise divine signs
   That bind & intertwine deep dives 
             That jive soul of sight 
    That blind for truth to be in light 
    Everyone has a struggle to fight 
         Rights won't wrong rights 
So two rights never makes a wrong 
  But two wrongs will still be wrong 
      Rights are loves only reason 
          As sun controls seasons 
      That's something to believe in 
              Reason to be legion 
       Religion destroyed meaning 
      Because it's sectioned feeling 
          Not seen as a whole being 
  Seeing freeing teeing agreements 
 Seen is the ball, four.... just teed off
        Free falling forever evermore 
         Doesn't stall it just free falls 
       Of course worse thoughts wall
        Raw doors open after before 
      So the shores wash up remorse 
           Find the old shit that's lost 
              With cost of getting shot 
         With loss of thought or course 

             Frosty freezing froze........
              Frontier freely arose ...
        Fate meets shape I suppose ...

               Still the entropy rolls 
          Sentimentally from the soul 
        Leads life's true needs & goals 
           While we stay stuck in polls 
      Wants arose caused pain I loath 
   Still mind is closed but enters slow 
           Like a hoe lets you know 
 It comes fast, than she takes it slow
     Heads up... nope! Always below  
            So she can blow my pole 
              So my pride will grow 
      Romeo holy moly suck my solo 
          Quench your thirst beautifol 
    Hoe her own education will grow
           When I say it I mean that 
              Just so you know hoe 
         Lyrics strike back like a pro
          The go is already in rows 
                 Like is a suppose 
              Love is life, to propose 
    Arose the perfect rose that grows 
     Until zero hit, now it's sub-zero 
   High low above below still I bellow
                     When I say .....
                            Hello !
                             Hallo!
                             Hola !
                            Aloha !
                       Kon'nichiwa !
                           Nín hǎo!
                    How are you pal ? 
                 ¿Cómo estás amigo? 
                    Anata wa dono yō 
                   ni parute imasu ka?   
                      Hoe bent u pal ?
          I said aloha, but how are ya ? 
          Oh nah, my minds blown up 
            Lyrics value still shows up .

          Frosty freezing froze........up
              Frontier freely arose ...
        Fate meets shape I suppose ...

            Doses dose mind closed  
                    Third eye open 
                  Inner soul awoken
Words pure notion spoken in motion 
      The closing opens the awoken 
Highest levels will have you opened 
     Turned motions rotates notions 
      Woken souls woke the broken 
         Hope angles I have spoken 
        Gratitudes handed as tokens 
            Hopes & dreams roping  
         Tugging needs into knowing 
     Wants of freedom start growing 
              Needs aren't holding 
          Because wants aren't rolling 
              Stalled falls start calling 
   When freedoms roar starts roaring 
                From the cores glory 
            History become old stories 
  But the future starts in the morning
            Worries create warnings  
      But it's one globe and warming 
     Seems the end may be dawning 
      But we have a way of assorting  
     Mind portals porting the haunting   Assorted haunted daunted warming
     Soaring temperatures flaunting 
   Heated reactions causes friction 
   But this edged the longest pouring 
          The masses swarming  
     While the banks keep roughting
While the mans the one supporting 
            I know it sounds corny 
           But it's for you from me 
        Cold colder frosty now freeze

            Frosty freezing froze........
              Frontier freely arose ...
        Fate meets shape I suppose ...
